news.warning: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
home.title: Hello!
home.1: This is the main page of our website.
home.2: Here you will find the latest news from all over the world, as well as a lot of interesting content on various topics.
home.3: If you want to be up to date on the latest events, go to the news page and find out more about what is happening in the world.
home.4: We also offer you to register.
home.5: Visit our site more often and be always aware of the latest events!
